contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of July, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court VACATED, and the matter REMANDED to the trial court for further proceedings consistent with Commonwealth v. Walker, 625 Pa. 450, 92 A.3d 766, 2014 WL 2208139 (Pa. May 28, 2014). Jurisdiction relinquished.
